Stronghold Crusader 2 is the long awaited sequel to Stronghold:
Crusader, the original 'castle sim'. After 12 years Stronghold returns
to the deserts of the Middle East circa 1189, with a new 3D engine
and realistic castle destruction powered by Havok Physics. Crusader
2 will recapture the original game's addictive, fast-paced gameplay
and authentic castle simulation.
